page.title: 08INTER ISLAND FERRIES
page.content:
"THE FERRY HAS OPENED UP THE ISLAND (FETLAR) TO ALL OF US AND VISITORS. IT IS MUCH BETTER. WE ARE SEEING MORE PEOPLE AND CARS." MRS. THOMASON (EMMA'S GRAN).
{FERRY ROUTE CROSSINGS { {GRIMA } MAINLAND-BRESSAY EVERY HOUR {HENDRA }MAINLAND-WHALSAY EVERY 2HRS {THORA & }MAINLAND-YELL EVERY HALF {FLYGA } HOUR {FILLA }MAINLAND-SKERRIES 4 PER WEEK {FIVLA }YELL-UNST EVERY HOUR {FIVLA }UNST-FETLAR 3 PER DAY
THE FIRST CAR FERRY WENT FROM THE MAINLAND TO YELL IN MAY 1973. EACH FERRY CAN CARRY APPROXIMATELY 100 PASSENGERS AND 12 CARS.
